newsletterContents.body:
• It is 4 years undergraduate designing degree. 
• In this course students will be introduced to all important  aspects of designing field. 
• Students can do specialization like product designing, industrial designing, Jewelry designing , Product designing

• Designers plan the structure of something before it is actually made. /n• They help organizations to design their messages in a way so that are memorable and effective. /n• They  give actual pictures to the imaginations of the people.
• Eligibility Criteria: 10+2 with minimum 50% marks ,any stream. /n• Admission in College: Some institutes give admission based on 12th marks and some give based on  Entrance exam. /n
